attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: recently everyones hearts have been tounched by the case of Baby P, a 17month old boy who died as a result of being servely abused, neither the mother or step dad were charged with his murder, only to be charged with "causing or allowing the death...", which means for abusing and allowing her sons death, she could be out of prison in summer 2009! in cases such as these, the people involved shud be tried for murder!

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters.
reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
